body_html: The GraphDef file you need is currently not available from slim unfortunately. We should be able to do something similar to export_for_serving, but with f.write(inference_graph.as_graph_def().SerializeToString()) to write out the correct file, but nobody's added that yet.
body_text: The GraphDef file you need is currently not available from slim unfortunately. We should be able to do something similar to export_for_serving, but with f.write(inference_graph.as_graph_def().SerializeToString()) to write out the correct file, but nobody's added that yet.
body: The GraphDef file you need is currently not available from slim unfortunately. We should be able to do something similar to export_for_serving, but with `f.write(inference_graph.as_graph_def().SerializeToString())` to write out the correct file, but nobody's added that yet.
